data.name: MetaWorld® - The VR MMO Simulation
data.detailed_description:
Experience 20,000 square miles of massively scaled open world together. Discover endless activities and adventure, inside a real-time physics simulation allowing thousands of visitors to participate simultaneously online.

EXPERIENCE
A simulated world that continues to exist, even with no one around. Explore richly ambient, procedurally generated biomes, where everything you do is meaningful and has lasting consequences. Tap into a truly persistent open world, rich with life.

EXPLORE
Vast scale simulated reality with friends. Or get lost alone in 10,000 square miles of atmospheric world, constantly evolving and reacting to everything you do.

ENGAGE
Hunting, Fishing, Camping, Snorkeling, Sailing, Sports, Training, RC, Drones, Go Karts and much more!

PERSIST
Simulations in MetaWorld® continue even after players have logged out, and any impact users have had on the world remains.

LIVE
Neighbors are finally a thing in VR. Get your very own persistent living space in virtual reality.

BUILD
MetaWorld Builder® Lets you build, share, and monetize your own simulations in MetaWorld®.

MAKE
Make things and bring them to life in world.

BUY, SELL, TRADE
MetaWorld® features a powerful marketplace system for simulation products & services.

COLLECT
You can hold onto things of value found in world. Items can be kept in your Home, Backpack or Satchel. Anything of value can be sold, traded or given to others.

CAREER
Learn actual skills with true simulations. Advance yourself in MetaWorld® or beyond.

COLONIZE
Join the MetaWorld® space program and colonize other worlds.

PIONEER
MetaWorld® is community powered. Our members have genuine ownership and
are active participants helping to define all aspects of the world.

FEATURES

  • 20,000 square mile open world
  • True persistence
  • Day and night cycles
  • Weather system
  • Real-time lighting and shadows
  • Likeness Identity System
  • Lifelike tree simulation
  • Wind simulation
  • Cognitive Wildlife
  • Shared Real Time Physics
  • Tree simulation
  • Cognitive / wild life simulation
  • Behavioral Animation System
  • High Quality Positional VOIP
  • Emote System
  • Avatar Gesture System
  • Persistent Inventory

data.short_description: MetaWorld® invites you explore a persistent 10,000 square mile, massively scaled open world together. Discover endless activities and adventure, inside a real-time physics simulation allowing thousands of visitors to participate simultaneously online.
data.reviews:
“When you stroll through MetaWorld, a future of simulated living seems imminently plausible.”
CNBC

“Being a simulation that runs regardless of whether people are there makes MetaWorld one of the closest things we have to a real-life version of the Matrix.”
New Scientist

“MetaWorld is properly persistent. When you throw a rock or drop a stick, it stays in that exact spot until you or someone else decides to move it. The idea is that the space has its own ecology and history, changing over time as people interact with it.”
Engadget

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
